t a,10
a t a,20
t a t a,30          # 4-phones
t a t a t,25        # 5-phones
a t t a,20
t   a  a,10         # extra spacing
#,1                 # empty token after strip() → bucket-0 guard
t % a,1             # illegal '%' symbol to trigger fallback
a # t,2             # literal boundary in middle
x y z,              # missing freq → defaults to 0
